    public class CharacterSelector
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
implements iCharacterSelected
    Activity to select a Character from the 3 default ones, or create up to 5 new ones.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, android.content.Intent data)
      We control the deletion of characters, not making it able to have less than one.
      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      We obtain each character icon into Constants from the ones preloaded into the code (in this version, 10 characters), obtain all the previous information (biomes, content file, etc...) from the Intent, configure each characteristic of each player on default, add the necessary buttons and views, and finally check if its the first time starting the app, so we can show the interactive tutorial.
      boolean onOptionsItemSelected(android.view.MenuItem item)
      Method called by system.
      void setCharacter(int pos)
      We can logically add a new character to the list.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        We obtain each character icon into Constants from the ones preloaded into the code (in this version, 10 characters), obtain all the previous information (biomes, content file, etc...) from the Intent, configure each characteristic of each player on default, add the necessary buttons and views, and finally check if its the first time starting the app, so we can show the interactive tutorial.
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState -

      • onActivityResult

        protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                @Nullable
                                android.content.Intent data)
        We control the deletion of characters, not making it able to have less than one. Also, we get a control over the costs of the lands related to the characters.
        Overrides:
        onActivityResult in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        requestCode - == 4 for Constants.RESULT_FOR_CHARACTER_EDITOR success.
        resultCode - == -1 for Activity.RESULT_OK success.
        data - Previous Intent could be == null.

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(android.view.MenuItem item)
        Method called by system.
        Overrides:
        onOptionsItemSelected in class android.app.Activity
        Parameters:
        item - Related to the menu item of the activity.
        Returns:
        true value for the back button pressed.

      • setCharacter

        public void setCharacter(int pos)
        We can logically add a new character to the list. Also, if its the fist time starting the app, we can show the interactive tutorial.
        Specified by:
        setCharacter in interface iCharacterSelected
        Parameters:
        pos - to process the position of the character we are analyzing.
